about_the_game:
Everything about GeckoShop:

GeckoShop is a Sandbox Shop Simulator + Creature Collector, where you manage your own shop, selling all the different varieties of geckos!

"Your dream of having your own Petshop finally comes true. Get cozy and have a fun time collecting and selling lizards, or grind hard and be the next millionare on this island!"

You'll have to:

  • Deal with customers, set your own Prices.

  • Keep the store clean and working, or get Employees to do it for you!

  • Explore the small open-world city, with People to interact with, Quests and other things at every corner.

  • Find Shells and ancient Artifacts on the beach to fill the museum, to unlock even more content as you go.

  • Accept Quests from various NPCs on the island.

  • Catch Thieves trying to steal from your shop.

  • Decorate and upgrade your store, however you want. 

Collect a big variety of different types and rarities of Lizards.

You can sell your pets, or turn your Shop into a zoo!

There are hundreds of geckos for you to unlock, in 4 rarities. Through opening chests, mutating geckos in the Lab, Vending machines, and through sidequests.

Buy and open different Boxes, to get random Geckos from that set, and if you're lucky enough you might even find a Super rare gecko.

Upgrade, Decorate and Paint your Shop, however you feel like.

Hire Employees to assist you to sell pets and products, clean trash from your store, and catch thieves before they can steal anything.

Keep your shop small or upgrade it to the maximum, make a giant warehouse full of rare items and animals.

Collect Trophies to display in the Backroom of your Shop, to keep track of your Progress.

Explore the City, Mutate Geckos, Eat burgers, Repeat.

The City is full of Surprises! Check out the Lab, where "Zippy Joe" made a machine to mutate 5 geckos into another one, and with some luck you might even get a Lab-exclusive gecko (very rare, they sparke in rainbow colors!)

Go to the Wrenchshop, and talk with "Bolt" about upgrading your shop, or go to the Paintshop and let "Doodle" paint your whole Shop.

And dont forget to get a Burger from the restaurant next to the Beach!

Sidequests everywhere!

You might want to go treasure hunting, or collect shells and ancient artifacts to keep the museum growing.

Or maybe you want to catch fishes all day long and forget about your customers!
Sell your fishes to "Skipper", but don't worry, you'll see in your Collection which fishes you've already catched, and which ones are missing.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(We are also working on adding Multiple Languages, Full Controller Support, Steam Achievements etc. as soon as possible.)
